mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Maulsby, Thomas A. to Pierpont, Francis Harrison
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Maulsby, Thomas A.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Jany 29 1862. By Telegraph from Fairmont 29 1862. It is understood Capt Nays Company will be disbanded and he is going to return to secessionists their captured guns answer tonight Capt TA Maulsby 21A18pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Maulsby, Thomas A.
Fairmont, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis Harrison
